speaker: Narrator
text: Rain patters against the windows of the Lanternrest Inn as travelers murmur about pale lights in the pines.

speaker: Player
text: I am an immortal sage who lived centuries who look in the 30s (I honed many skills, and my body into the ultimate weapon and my mind into the ultimate wisdom, I learned all magic and made my own) But here I am with no memory of my past I step into the inn, Not knowing why I am here.

speaker: Narrator
text: You step out of the rain and into the inn's amber light. Conversation falters for a breath as soaked cloaks turn your way, then resumes in low, uneasy tones about pale lights and the road gone quiet.

speaker: NPC (Proprietor)
text: The proprietor dries a mug with a rough cloth and nods at you. "Seat by the hearth if you need warmth. If you're hunting answers, ask about Old Pine Road before night deepens."

speaker: Narrator
text: Current state: Location: Lanternrest Inn common room near the hearth. Time: Rainy evening. Party status: Hashibee alone, composed, amnesiac, newly inside and observing. NPCs present: unnamed proprietor and several wary travelers. Open quests: missing travelers, pale lights in the pines, missing caravan, Kael the ranger still missing. Immediate threats: none inside the inn; tension rising around night travel. Unresolved choices: question the proprietor, speak to travelers, reveal or conceal your strange condition, or leave now for Old Pine Road. Recent changes: entered inn from the rain; received first local lead toward Old Pine Road.
